Project 1

Spotter provides an enhanced social network for Spotify. Users can login with their spotify account, meet others who share their musical taste, find nearby people who are currently listening to the same music, chat with one another, and suggest music to friends.

  • Client: Spotyfy Users
  • Date: Mar 2019
  • Service: Social Application

Project 2

Chatty will allow users to communicate with each other without having to register accounts. It will use React, a popular front-end library created and used heavily by Facebook as well as modern tools for Node including Webpack and Babel.

  • Client: Everyone
  • Date: Feb 2019
  • Service: Chat Room

Project 3

Pizza4Pickup is for both hungry customers and restaurants, to place orders, get real-time updates. It's a full stack app with Ritual like features using Twilio for text message alerts, Node.js Express jQuery, PostgresSQL, SASS.

  • Client: Hungry Customers and Restaurant Owners
  • Date: Feb 2019
  • Service: Food Pickup

Project 4

tweeter Tweeter is a simple, single-page Twitter clone.

  • Client: Everyone
  • Date: Jan 2019
  • Service: Social Application

Project 5

TinyApp is a full stack web application built with Node and Express that allows users to shorten long URLs

  • Client: Everyone
  • Date: Jan 2019
  • Service: Tool
